title: black screen cant load in
body: so about every 3 games, when a game is starting the client starts up but it is just a black screen and will never actually start loading in. i can force it to close through the task manager and try and reconnect but it doesnt work i can close everything and relog in and try and reconnect but it wont work. and then randomly after a while it will work but its multiple minuets into game. im not sure what to do because its not every game but every few it seems to break and then go back to normal. and then after however long it lets me load in (one game it was 10 min into game) and i asked my team about why they didnt remake they said they couldnt. i dont want to lose game and i dont want to make the game less fun when i randomly cant load in. id love some help in fixing it.

replies.body: This black screen can happen when your connection is failing to reach the game server, so it can't download any assets.  Your network seems like it's degrading, so it's likely that over time you just won't be able to play any game.  I know that's a lot of uncertainty, so I recommend going over the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to fix this up.  Make sure to go over each step to rule out possibilities, then test it in custom to be sure!

i have the exact same problem and sometimes it does say that my connection has been lost. I've looked and looked for a solution, been through all of the YouTube videos and all of the forum feeds. No solution. I used to just reset my router and it would work, but not anymore. This bug made me quit LoL for about 6 months only to return to this shit. I know Riot employees have to follow their steps in directing people to the connection issues page, but it hasn't helped me. On every forum I see the same thing, a nice reply from a Riot employee with the same link near the bottom of their response. The only thing that i know for a fact works is going into Computer / Local Disc: C / Riot Games / League of Legends / Config / CFG File. Then once your in there you change the "WindowMode" to 1
But if you do this you have to play in windowed  mode (Which sucks) and if i swap back to full screen or borderless it has the same problem
